overview:
Brook Lang is currently the Founder and CEO of Montavo, Inc.

Mr. Lang has previously served as CEO of Infomove, a leading wireless technology company, growing the company from intellectual property development phase to successful market launch. Subsequently, he was appointed to T-Mobile, a leading provider of wireless telecommunications services and a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group to spearhead sales and marketing initiatives in national retail for T-Mobile. Mr. Lang was responsible for $800 million in yearly acquisition revenue, and helped negotiate and conclude a multimillion dollar multi-year sales program for T-Mobile. He also directed and co-managed a field sales force of over 400 sales personnel to exceed sales revenue quotas.

After T-Mobile Mr. Lang started several executive projects in the wireless industry helping launch products and services to the wireless, content, gaming, retail, distribution, and enterprise markets, with L & S. Later, Mr. Lang, together with proprietary IP he developed, was engaged to lead Montavo.
